  • Terragrunt (‚≠ê8.8k) - Keep your configurations DRY, work with multiple modules, and manage remote state.

  • boring-registry (‚≠ê209) - Boring-registry is an open-source module and provider registry compatible with OpenTofu.

  • terraform-registry (‚≠ê109) - Modules registry with authentication and support for multiple backends.
  • terrareg (‚≠ê303) - Open-source modules registry with UI, optional Git integration and deep analysis.
  • terustry (‚≠ê67) - Proxy registry for providers.
